column1: All the Brits coming back from Wuhan are being quarantined in a hospital on Merseyside for two weeks. Sweet! Keep them up there. #CoronaVirus

There's a lot of Chinese people living in Canada Water now. I've been going around the local Sainsbury's next to the tube with Shake n' Vac and an air freshener when I shop for Rizla's. #Coronavirus ain't killing me! I want to die of a old fashioned disease like heart failure.
She took him out quicker than #CoronaVirus https://twitter.com/RexChapman/status/1229425629290024961 …
